class.name: CenterContainer
class.description: CenterContainer Keeps children controls centered. This container keeps all children to their minimum size, in the center.

method.name: is_using_top_left
method.description: Should put children to the top left corner instead of center of the container.

method.name: set_use_top_left
method.description: This function will anchor the container children to the top left corner of the the container boundaries, moving all its children to that position, (the children new center will be the top left corner of the container).
